text: :alert: Mobile Chat SDK for iOS has been updated to <https://github.com/HubSpot/mobile-chat-sdk-ios/releases/tag/1.0.4|v.1.0.4>. This will help EU1 hubs with setting device tokens for use with push notifications and reporting in the chatflows table the device types (Android or iOS) that have started threads for each chatflow. We will be updating the Android build as well and will make an announcement here once that is available. Thank you!
